details.title: Comments on “THz Time-Domain Sensing: The Antenna Dispersion Problem and a Possible Solution”
details.abstract: Comments about the paper "THz Time-Domain Sensing: The Antenna Dispersion Problem and a Possible Solution" are written in the present manuscript, where is highlighted some important issues with the antenna analysis in the mentioned paper.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
